extendedInfo.description: Keep an eye on your surveillance cameras anytime, anywhere with D-Linkâs D-ViewCam Mobile app. The D-ViewCam Mobile app makes it easy to check on your home or business no matter where you are, no matter what time of day it is. D-ViewCam Mobile uses your 3G or WiFi Internet connection to remotely connect to your D-ViewCam server or D-Link NVR, giving you instant access to your camerasâ live video feeds on your mobile device. Now you can keep a close eye on whatâs happening, even when youâre off-site.Features- View your surveillance camerasâ live video- Get a quick overview of whatâs happening with a grid view of your cameras- Use pan/tilt/zoom (PTZ) controls to adjust your view for supported cameras- Supports camera view preset points to quickly view specific camera angles- Take snapshots of live camera video and save them to your mobile device- Send DI/DO signals to trigger devices such as alarms or lights- View cameras from multiple serversSupported Mobile Devices:Supports devices with Android versions up to 4.0Supported D-Link products:- DCS-210 D-ViewCam Standard, v1.1 or higher- DCS-220 D-ViewCam Professional, v1.2 or higher- DCS-230 D-ViewCam Enterprise, v1.2 or higher- DNR-322L mydlink Network Video Recorder(NVR), firmware v1.2 or higher- DNR-326 2-Bay Professional Network Video Recorder(NVR), firmware v1.1 or higherSupported Video Codecs-MJPEG -MPEG4-H.264

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its great when works, but most of the time I can\'t even Connect to view the cameras.
reviews.author: Kelli Brigman

reviews.title: d-view cam mobile
reviews.comment: This app seems to be limited to certain cameras. It has no search feature and simply does not work. I want my 99 cents back.
reviews.author: fred brown

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: I see only 6 cameras of 32! Why?
reviews.author: Connann C

reviews.title: Random Device Compatibility
reviews.comment: I can install this on my Wildfire S with it\'s minuscule display but not my Nexus 4? I can install it on my Nexus 7 but not my Nexus 7 3G?  So I can only view cameras away from home on a small screen or whilst sat near a public Wi-Fi point?  Excellent, NOT!!!
reviews.author: Greg Hoyle

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: When server is running\' always crashes on Nexus 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing on pics galaxy nexus. I have the PC client on two computers and you can only view one cam at a time even though I can see all 4 of my cameras
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gal s2, ics. Doesnt work
reviews.comment: When attempting to connect, it crashes 100% if the time.   galaxy s2, ics 4.0
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force closes on my galaxy nexus
reviews.author: A Google User
